verses.text: God presides \w in|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* great \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w*. \w He|strong="H7130"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* amongst \w the|strong="H8199"\w* gods.

“\w How|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w unjustly|strong="H5766"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w show|strong="H5375"\w* \w partiality|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*?” \qs \+w Selah|strong="H5542"\+w*.\qs*

“\w Defend|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w weak|strong="H1800"\w*, \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*. Maintain \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w rights|strong="H1800"\w* \w of|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6041"\w*.

\w Rescue|strong="H5337"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w weak|strong="H1800"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w needy|strong="H1800"\w*. \w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w out|strong="H5337"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.”

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* don’t \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w*. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w back|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w forth|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2825"\w*. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w foundations|strong="H4144"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w shaken|strong="H4131"\w*.

\w I|strong="H1121"\w* said, “\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* gods, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Most|strong="H5945"\w* \w High|strong="H5945"\w*.

Nevertheless you \w shall|strong="H8269"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w like|strong="H4191"\w* \w men|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H8269"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w like|strong="H4191"\w* one \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w*.”

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, God, \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.
